title: Gamification-Based Programming Education Design for Beginners

context.prior_knowledge: Requires understanding of basic programming concepts
context.additional_context: Project-based learning environment for pre-service teachers to enhance digital literacy, incorporating gamification elements to motivate learning and develop foundational programming competencies

learning_goals: Learners achieve an 80% or higher correctness rate in programming problem-solving processes
Learners establish self-reflective feedback strategies upon consecutive errors in a gamification system
Learners can generate personalized problem-solving log analysis reports at the end of a 6-month course
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
